TestWriteFile.task: Write the word 'Washington' to a .txt file
TestWriteFile.answer: The word 'Washington', printed to a .txt file named anything
TestWriteFile.description: Tests the agents ability to write to a file

TestSearch.task: Open 'https://silennaihin.com/random/plain.html' and paste all of the text on the page in a .txt file
TestSearch.answer:
This is a Heading
This is a paragraph.
TestSearch.description: Tests if an llm can search

TestReadFile.task: Read the file called file_to_read.txt and write its content to a file called output.txt
TestReadFile.answer: The content of output.txt should be 'Hello World!'
TestReadFile.description: Tests the ability for an agent to read a file.

TestPlanCreation.task: As an agent powered by a large language model, create a plan for yourself based on the task of booking a flight to Toronto. Output this plan into a .txt file.
TestPlanCreation.answer:
1. Search for flights to Toronto.
2. Select the cheapest flight.
3. Book the flight.
4. Pay for the flight.
5. Confirm the flight.
TestPlanCreation.description: Tests ability to generate content based on the content of 2 files.

TestBasicRetrieval.task: Write the price of the book in this url 'http://books.toscrape.com/catalogue/meditations_33/index.html' to a .txt file.
TestBasicRetrieval.description: Specifies specific website to retrieve website from.

TestWrite5FilesWithArray.task: Create a .txt file for every item in this array ['Hello World', 'Yum', 'Tea', '2314', 'Goodbye']
TestWrite5FilesWithArray.answer: All of the elements should be contained in the output files
TestWrite5FilesWithArray.description: How good the agent is at instruction following. Divergence is measured by how many extra files are created

TestBasicMemory.task: Follow the instructions in the instructions_1.txt file
TestBasicMemory.description: Tests ability for the agent to remember information between each action. An id is presented initially and the agent has to remember it after reading 4 other files

TestDebugSimpleTypoWithGuidance.task:
1- Run test.py.
2- Read sample_code.py.
3- Modify sample_code.py.
Repeat step 1, 2 and 3 until test.py runs without errors.
TestDebugSimpleTypoWithGuidance.description: Tests ability for the agent to debug python code with a simple typo in it.

TestWrite6Files.task: Follow these exact instructions. Create 6 files txt files. 2 of them should say 'Hello World', 2 should say 'Yum!' and the last 2 should say 'Good weather huh?'
TestWrite6Files.answer: It should copy the above text with no loss
TestWrite6Files.description: Tests how good the agent is at closely following the goals that it's given.

TestRememberMultipleIds.task: Follow the instructions in the instructions_1.txt file
TestRememberMultipleIds.description: Tests ability for the agent to remember information between each action. Multiple ids are presented in different files and the last file instructs the agent to write these ids into another file.

TestDebugSimpleTypoWithoutGuidance.description: Tests ability for the agent to debug python code with a simple typo in it, using a very broad prompt without guidance

TestRememberMultipleIdsWithNoise.task: Follow the instructions in the instructions_1.txt file
TestRememberMultipleIdsWithNoise.description: Tests ability for the agent to remember information between each action. Multiple ids are presented in different files and the last file instructs the agent to write these ids into another file. Some noise is also added to the files to test the agent's ability to filter out noise.

TestAdaptTeslaRevenue.task: I'm a financial planner, please help me write tesla's r in 2022 into a .txt file.
TestAdaptTeslaRevenue.description: Given context adapt to the missing of the word revenue
